use_losebridge: Unfortunately, you cannot find a way to go out of the **Ruins.**
use_bridge: You climb up to the **Bridge**, going to the **Windy Mountains**...
use_cliff: You tried to climb the **Cliff**, but you only climbed up an inch. You fall down back to the **Ruins**...
use_table: Interestingly, you cannot seem to find a way to open the **Barrels**, or even look at what could be inside of them...
